API Reference

KMC Module

Kinetic Monte Carlo Simulation Module

This module provides functions for performing Kinetic Monte Carlo (KMC) simulations of hydrogen atom hopping on lattice structures.

The module includes:

  • KMC1: Simple 2D lattice hopping simulation

  • KMC2: 2D lattice hopping with multiple transition types

Example

>>> import numpy as np
>>> from KMC import KMC1, KMC2
>>>
>>> # Simple 2D simulation
>>> initial_pos = [0, 0]
>>> trajectory = KMC1(initial_pos, 0.5, 0.5, 1000)
KMC.KMC1(position_0, gamma_1, gamma_2, N)[source]
